altername_name: 蒼き雷霆ガンヴォルト爪
name: Azure Striker Gunvolt 2
overview: The game is the sequel to 2014's Azure Striker Gunvolt. The game released on August 25th in Japan, and was released worldwide on September 29th. Gunvolt is back as a playable character with new weapons and gear. Copen returns as a new playable character in the game, redesigned and packing new mechanics never seen before in the franchise.
